pageTitle: Deputy Prime Ministerâ€™s itinerary for Monday, December 16, 2019 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Vancouver, British Columbia

2:00 p.m. The Deputy Prime Minister will meet with the Mayor of Vancouver, Kennedy Stewart.

Office of the Mayor
Vancouver City Hall
453 West 12th Ave

Note for media:

  • Photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting

5:00 p.m. The Deputy Prime Minister will meet with the Premier of British Columbia, John Horgan.

Vancouver Cabinet Office
Vancouver World Trade Centre
999 Canada Place, suite 730

Note for media:

  • Photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting
